Photo: Amerix (X) https://t.co/svzZi9SdPq

What your body doesn't need:

‚Ä¢ Folic acid

‚Ä¢ Fluoride 

‚Ä¢ Calcium supplements 

They are synthetic, can't be absorbed, and are useless.

What your body needs:

‚Ä¢ Vitamin K2

‚Ä¢ Folate (Vitamin B9)

They are natural and essential.

BEST sources of Vitamin K2:
‚Ä¢ Meat
‚Ä¢ Beef Liver
‚Ä¢ Egg yolk
‚Ä¢ Butter
‚Ä¢ Fermented foods eg Sauerkraut and Fermented raw milk.

BEST sources of Folate:
‚Ä¢ Eggs
‚Ä¢ Beef Liver
‚Ä¢ Dark leafy veggies 

However, Folate and Vitamin K2 will support your nutritional needs if you synergize with Vitamin B12 and Vitamin D3.

Vitamin B12 is Cobalamin.

BEST sources of Vitamin B12:
‚Ä¢ Meat
‚Ä¢ Fish
‚Ä¢ Egg
‚Ä¢ Bone broth

Vitamin D3 is Cholecalciferol.

BEST sources of Vitamin D3:
‚Ä¢ The sun
‚Ä¢ Salmon
‚Ä¢ Sardines: Omena
‚Ä¢ Egg yolk
‚Ä¢ Beef Liver

If you must supplement folate, then get L-methyl folate. It is the active form of folate (NOT folic acid).

If you must supplement cobalamin, then get methyl-cobalamin. It is the active form of Vitamin B12 (NOT cynocobalamin).

The system pays 'experts' to push for useless synthetic products because these products fetch a lot of money for the Big Pharma.

For example, folic acid is in every processed grains, fluor, pasta, and drinks, while fluoride is in toothpaste and mineral water. 

You don't need fluoride,

You don't need folic acid,

You don't need calcium supplements.

You need FOOD and the SUN.

You need Vitamin K2, Vitamin B9, Vitamin B12, and Vitamin D3.

Stop profiteering the corrupt pharmaceutical industry.

#BetterTogether
